name: Variable Munition
effect: Gain the Poke The Beast Protocol which you can use to change the damage type of the weapon this mod is applied to

actions.name: Poke The Beast
actions.detail:
Roll 1d6 to determine the weapon's new damage type
1- Kinetic
2- Energy
3- Explosive
4- Heat
5- Burn
6- Choose (Kinetic, Energy, Explosive, Heat)
